## ClaimConditionPhase.setWaitTimeBetweenClaims() method

Wait time enforced after calling `claim` before the next `claim` can be called.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setWaitTimeBetweenClaims(waitInSeconds: BigNumberish): ClaimConditionPhase;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  waitInSeconds | BigNumberish | The wait time in seconds. |

<b>Returns:</b>

ClaimConditionPhase
